text: cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa xo phu thi di krab khamphir thanghlay! Pheraa hetu dı than cung khadkhwang ph sraththa sung thang khx ngxallxh doythi phwk than prarthna ca hı thang khx ngxallxh khd thang «thi phwk than k pen phyan yunyan xyu læa xallxh nan michı pen phuthrng phelx nı sing thi phwk than kratha kan
